description.description: Query description - explains what data is collected and why
examples: Collects all USB devices connected to the host for security monitoring
Tracks failed authentication attempts to detect brute force attacks

query.description: SQL query to execute using osquery tables
examples: SELECT username, time FROM last WHERE tty NOT LIKE '%/0';
SELECT name, version, bundle_identifier FROM apps;

platform.description: Target platform(s) - comma-separated list or empty for all platforms

interval.description: Seconds between query runs (e.g., 3600 = 1 hour, 86400 = 1 day)

observer_can_run.description: Allow observer role to run this query

labels_include_any.description: Query applies to hosts with any of these labels

discard_data.description: Discard query results data (useful for queries that trigger automations but don't need stored results)

logging.description: Logging mode: snapshot (full results each time), differential (only changes), differential_ignore_removals (only additions)
